程序包 net.minecraft.inventory

类 Slot

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.inventory.Slot
  • 直接已知子类:
    ContainerBeacon.BeaconSlot, ContainerBrewingStand.Fuel, ContainerBrewingStand.Ingredient, ContainerBrewingStand.Potion, GuiContainerCreative.CreativeSlot, GuiContainerCreative.LockedSlot, SlotCrafting, SlotFurnaceFuel, SlotFurnaceOutput, SlotItemHandler, SlotMerchantResult, SlotShulkerBox
    public class Slot
extends java.lang.Object

    • 字段概要

      修饰符和类型 字段 说明

      protected java.lang.Object backgroundMap  
      protected java.lang.String backgroundName  
      IInventory inventory
      The inventory we want to extract a slot from.
      int slotNumber
      the id of the slot(also the index in the inventory arraylist)
      int xPos
      display position of the inventory slot on the screen x axis
      int yPos
      display position of the inventory slot on the screen y axis

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      boolean canTakeStack​(EntityPlayer playerIn)
      Return whether this slot's stack can be taken from this slot.
      ItemStack decrStackSize​(int amount)
      Decrease the size of the stack in slot (first int arg) by the amount of the second int arg.
      ResourceLocation getBackgroundLocation()
      Gets the path of the texture file to use for the background image of this slot when drawing the GUI.
      protected TextureMap getBackgroundMap()  
      TextureAtlasSprite getBackgroundSprite()  
      boolean getHasStack()
      Returns if this slot contains a stack.
      int getItemStackLimit​(ItemStack stack)  
      int getSlotIndex()
      Retrieves the index in the inventory for this slot, this value should typically not be used, but can be useful for some occasions.
      int getSlotStackLimit()
      Returns the maximum stack size for a given slot (usually the same as getInventoryStackLimit(), but 1 in the case of armor slots)
      java.lang.String getSlotTexture()  
      ItemStack getStack()
      Helper fnct to get the stack in the slot.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Actualy only call when we want to render the white square effect over the slots.
      boolean isHere​(IInventory inv, int slotIn)
      returns true if the slot exists in the given inventory and location
      boolean isItemValid​(ItemStack stack)
      Check if the stack is allowed to be placed in this slot, used for armor slots as well as furnace fuel.
      boolean isSameInventory​(Slot other)
      Checks if the other slot is in the same inventory, by comparing the inventory reference.
      protected void onCrafting​(ItemStack stack)
      the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood.
      protected void onCrafting​(ItemStack stack, int amount)
      the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood.
      void onSlotChange​(ItemStack p_75220_1_, ItemStack p_75220_2_)
      if par2 has more items than par1, onCrafting(item,countIncrease) is called
      void onSlotChanged()
      Called when the stack in a Slot changes
      protected void onSwapCraft​(int p_190900_1_)  
      ItemStack onTake​(EntityPlayer thePlayer, ItemStack stack)  
      void putStack​(ItemStack stack)
      Helper method to put a stack in the slot.
      void setBackgroundLocation​(ResourceLocation texture)
      Sets the texture file to use for the background image of the slot when it's empty.
      void setBackgroundName​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets which icon index to use as the background image of the slot when it's empty.

        The inventory we want to extract a slot from.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onSlotChange

        public void onSlotChange​(ItemStack p_75220_1_,
                         ItemStack p_75220_2_)
        if par2 has more items than par1, onCrafting(item,countIncrease) is called

      • onCrafting

        protected void onCrafting​(ItemStack stack,
                          int amount)
        the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood. Typically increases an internal count then calls onCrafting(item).

      • onSwapCraft

        protected void onSwapCraft​(int p_190900_1_)

      • onCrafting

        protected void onCrafting​(ItemStack stack)
        the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood.

      • onTake

        public ItemStack onTake​(EntityPlayer thePlayer,
                        ItemStack stack)

      • isItemValid

        public boolean isItemValid​(ItemStack stack)
        Check if the stack is allowed to be placed in this slot, used for armor slots as well as furnace fuel.

      • getStack

        public ItemStack getStack()
        Helper fnct to get the stack in the slot.

      • getHasStack

        public boolean getHasStack()
        Returns if this slot contains a stack.

      • putStack

        public void putStack​(ItemStack stack)
        Helper method to put a stack in the slot.

      • onSlotChanged

        public void onSlotChanged()
        Called when the stack in a Slot changes

      • getSlotStackLimit

        public int getSlotStackLimit()
        Returns the maximum stack size for a given slot (usually the same as getInventoryStackLimit(), but 1 in the case of armor slots)

      • getItemStackLimit

        public int getItemStackLimit​(ItemStack stack)

      • getSlotTexture

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getSlotTexture()

      • decrStackSize

        public ItemStack decrStackSize​(int amount)
        Decrease the size of the stack in slot (first int arg) by the amount of the second int arg. Returns the new stack.

      • isHere

        public boolean isHere​(IInventory inv,
                      int slotIn)
        returns true if the slot exists in the given inventory and location

      • canTakeStack

        public boolean canTakeStack​(EntityPlayer playerIn)
        Return whether this slot's stack can be taken from this slot.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Actualy only call when we want to render the white square effect over the slots. Return always True, except for the armor slot of the Donkey/Mule (we can't interact with the Undead and Skeleton horses)

      • getBackgroundLocation

        public ResourceLocation getBackgroundLocation()
        Gets the path of the texture file to use for the background image of this slot when drawing the GUI.
        返回:
        The resource location for the background image

      • setBackgroundLocation

        public void setBackgroundLocation​(ResourceLocation texture)
        Sets the texture file to use for the background image of the slot when it's empty.
        参数:
        texture - the resourcelocation for the texture

      • setBackgroundName

        public void setBackgroundName​(@Nullable
                              java.lang.String name)
        Sets which icon index to use as the background image of the slot when it's empty.
        参数:
        name - The icon to use, null for none

      • getBackgroundSprite

        @Nullable
public TextureAtlasSprite getBackgroundSprite()

      • getBackgroundMap

        protected TextureMap getBackgroundMap()

      • getSlotIndex

        public int getSlotIndex()
        Retrieves the index in the inventory for this slot, this value should typically not be used, but can be useful for some occasions.
        返回:
        Index in associated inventory for this slot.

      • isSameInventory

        public boolean isSameInventory​(Slot other)
        Checks if the other slot is in the same inventory, by comparing the inventory reference.
        参数:
        other -
        返回:
        true if the other slot is in the same inventory
